name: What I've Heard About These Plains
name_original: What I've Heard About These Plains
description:
A short interactive narrative, exploring liminality and non-places. Starting with the night's final moments and working backwards, the player makes a choice between history and art -- religion and purpose.

Made for Independent Games & Playable Experience Design, UoL. 

Music by Jonny Greenwood. 

Assets from Jacek Koczmierowski, CGTrader, and the Unity Asset Store. 

Sounds from Lightfield Audio and YourPeacefulSound. 

All other assets by me.
